author: G GOWTHAM
title: Prabhas Failed - Vijay Deverakonda Next...
text:
amitabhBachchan's portrayal of Aswaththama was the real star, even though
prabhasplayed the protagonist. The sheer generosity of Bachchan's on-screen persona and distinctive baritone was too much for even
prabhasto surpass.
According to recent speculations,
amitabh bachchanmay appear in
rahulSankrityan's future film, which is directed by Vijay Deverakonda.
rayalaseemain the 1850s serves as the setting for the film, which promises an engaging plot. Big B and
vijay deverakondatogether in a
movieseems like such an amazing prospect. It may make for a great
movieif there are face-off moments between the two. But as seen in
kalki2898 AD, Bachchan's dominant presence might eclipse VD.
We need to see if VD is willing to take the chance of seeing another actor's histrionics shine in a movie. However, Big B's involvement in the project, which is now known as VD14, has not been formally verified, thus they are merely rumors.
Due to the reunion of
vijay deverakondaand
rahul sankrityanfollowing their successful film Taxiwaala, the project has already attracted a lot of attention. Expectations are high because it is being produced by Mythri
movieMakers. The fact that Adipurush star Ajay-Atul has been enlisted to write the soundtrack further heightens the anticipation. Arnold Vosloo, actor of The Mummy, has also been confirmed to play a significant part, while renowned cinematographer Éric Gautier, who has worked on movies like Into the Wild and The Motorcycle Diaries, has joined as
directorof photography.

author: Laura De Rosa
title: Hai una vecchia zanzariera rotta? Prima di gettarla via, prova a riciclarla prendendo spunto da queste geniali idee creative
text:
Indice
Porta orecchini Organizer da divano Coprivivande Sacchetti Zanzariera per passeggino Se non fosse per le zanzariere , le estati trascorse in casa potrebbero diventare decisamente troppo “punzecchianti”. Nella loro estrema semplicità, specie quando si alleano a creme, lozioni spray e trucchi antizanzare , ci salvano dalle fastidiose punture.
Povere zanzare, non è colpa loro se la natura le ha rese tanto irritanti, ma la convivenza tra questi insetti e noi esseri umani è difficile, quindi bisogna ingegnarsi, volenti o nolenti, nel trovare soluzioni. Le zanzariere, innocue ma efficaci, si rivelano ideali per risolvere il problema e gestire la convivenza in modo pacifico. Perlomeno finché non si rompono.
A quel punto, sempre che non si riesca a riparare i danni, come spesso accade nella vita bisogna fare una scelta: sbarazzarsene o riciclarle. Noi optiamo per la seconda soluzione. E dopo aver visto le idee fai da te che abbiamo selezionato, siamo certi che anche tu vorrai provarci. Ma sì, offrila una seconda possibilità alla zanzariera rotta… che ti costa!
Porta orecchini La prima idea che ti proponiamo è il porta orecchini, facile facile, utile e funzionale, specie se ne indossi tanti e spesso. Come procedere?
Taglia un pezzo di zanzariera, meglio di forma quadrata o rettangolare, e fissala su un telaio di misure adeguate, che puoi recuperare da una vecchia tela da pittura. Oppure utilizza una cornice. Per fissare la zanzariera ti basteranno dei piccoli chiodini, ma potrebbero bastare anche delle semplici puntine. A questo punto decidi dove collocare il porta orecchini e inizia a infilare gli orecchini nei fori della zanzariera.
Organizer da divano Se perdi in continuazione telecomandi e altri oggetti “da salotto”, niente di meglio che procurarti un pratico “organizer”. Puoi anche realizzarlo con le tue mani, e una zanzariera a portata di mano, seguendo il video tutorial di Creative U .
Coprivivande In estate proteggere gli alimenti lasciati all’aperto è una priorità perché gli insetti, a partire dalle mosche, non vedono l’ora di fiondarsi sul cibo. Perché non sfruttare le vecchie zanzariere? Una volta ripulite per bene, potrai utilizzarle per creare dei coprivivande fai da te.
Basta ritagliarne un pezzo e fissarlo intorno a una struttura portante, come negli esempi.
Sacchetti La vecchia zanzariera potrebbe trasformarsi anche in un comodo sacchetto per frutta e verdura. Basta ritagliarne un pezzo e cucire la parte superiore, infilandovi un elastico per chiudere e aprire il sacchetto.
Zanzariera per passeggino Se la vecchia zanzariera è abbastanza grande, potresti tagliarla in più parti e utilizzarle per creare ex novo un pratico copri-passeggino. Se vuoi personalizzarlo rendendolo più carino, incolla sopra delle toppe a forma di fiorellino, cuore, coccinella o quello che più ti piace.
Non vuoi perdere le nostre notizie?
Iscriviti ai nostri canali Whatsapp e Telegram Siamo anche su Google News , attiva la stella per inserirci tra le fonti preferite Leggi anche:
5 idee geniali per riciclare il tuo frigorifero: puoi trasformarlo in armadio, libreria e molto altro Hai un ombrellone da spiaggia rotto? Non gettarlo via, ma prendi spunto da queste idee per riciclare le diverse parti

author: al-rojo-vivo
title: "Dictadura queer" y "delirio queer": los mensaje de la nueva directora del Instituto de Mujeres en contra de la ley trans
text:
Polémica por el nombramiento
"Dictadura queer" y "delirio queer": los mensaje de la nueva directora del Instituto de Mujeres en contra de la ley trans
El Instituto de la Mujeres, dependiente del Ministerio de Igualdad, está sumado en una polémica. Su nueva directora desde el miércoles, Isabel García, ha hecho comentarios abiertamente transfobos. El partido de Yolanda Díaz y varios colectivos han cargado contra su nombramiento. García había sido asesora en el Ministerio de Transportes entre el año 2019 y 2022. Actualmente ejercía como consulta de políticas de igualdad en el sector privado.
En redes sociales ha plasmado sus ideas y su firme oposición a la ley trans y a la autodeterminación de género con expresiones como "dictadura queer" o "delirio queer". También ha dicho que la ley trans "amordaza a una parte de la sociedad" y "desprotege a los menores". Del mismo modo, ha acusado abiertamente a Podemos de dividir el movimiento feminista. En un tuit también llegó a recriminar a la socialista Andrea Fernández que defendiera la ley trans.
El historial de la recién nombrada directora ha enfadado a algunos sectores progresistas. Sumar ha calificado de inaceptable su nombramiento. "El nombramiento del Ministerio de Igualdad es inaceptable. La dirección del Instituto de las Mujeres no puede estar en manos de quien menosprecia e insulta a las mujeres y las personas LGTBI, cita la cuenta de la formación.
También lo ha criticado abiertamente Elizabeth Duval. "Este nombramiento del Ministerio de Igualdad es vergonzoso y envía un mensaje lamentable. El Instituto de las Mujeres no puede estar dirigido por alguien que sostiene la conspiración del borrado de las mujeres y critica la «dictadura queer»", ha expresado.
Por otro lado, la primer mujer trans diputada en España, Carla Antonelli, ha asegura que el Instituto de las Mujeres debe de ser para todas y cada una de las mujeres". "Esta mujer nos ha señalado a las mujeres trans, vejado e insultado", añade.
"Comentario clasista"
Antonio Maestre, a la exalcaldesa de Pamplona: "El trabajo de limpiadora es indigno por las condiciones, lo que es digno en la persona que lo ejerce"
Maestre cree que el de limpiar es un trabajo que debería pagarse mucho mejor o desaparecer. "Que lo haga cada uno en su casa si no pueden otorgar las condiciones que exigen", añade.

author: Sethuraman s
title: Heroic Pennsylvania woman saves baby during shocking interstate incident - Scoop Upworthy
text: Local woman intervenes in a violent dispute to save an infant's life on an overpass. Editor's note: This article was originally published on August 4, 2022. It has since been updated. Trigger warning: This article contains themes of domestic violence and child abuse that some readers may find distressing. A brave woman put her life on the line to save a child's life in an incident in Pennsylvania. Christine King stopped a man from throwing his baby off an interstate overpass while he was fighting with his ex-partner. King was driving along Interstate 95 in northeast Philadelphia when she noticed the couple fighting. She knew something was wrong with the way he was holding the baby and shouting at the woman. King soon realized that he was threatening to throw the baby off the highway overpass. King hit the brakes and pulled over. “I couldn’t just pass after I saw the baby,” said King, reported [6ABC](https://6abc.com/baby-threatened-interstate-95-man-threatens-to-throw-child-off-i-95-overpass-raheem-murphy-charged-woman-saves/12082360/). “And after I seen him trying to throw the baby over, I couldn’t let it go.” He also had a gun on him but that didn't deter King, who wanted to protect the baby. King focused on de-escalating the issue and trying to get hold of the baby. “I said, ‘Give me the baby.’ And I put my hand around the baby to pull the baby from him while she was trying to pull the baby too, and I said, ‘Give me the baby,’” said King. “He said, ‘Get off my baby, I will shoot you. I will shoot you.’” King struck a fine balance between reasoning and arguing as she tried to calm the man down and stop him from throwing his baby off the highway overpass. As she argued with the man, his former partner took the gun from him. “She went behind him, he was shaking so he didn’t know she was in his pocket, and that’s when she grabbed the gun out of his pocket,” said King. His former partner immediately pocketed the gun but he was still holding the baby. While they stalled him, authorities arrived at the scene, but it took a while even for them to extract the child from him. "The police then came and pointed their guns at him, but he didn't want to let the baby go," said King, reported [NBC Philadelphia](https://www.nbcphiladelphia.com/news/local/man-who-held-his-baby-girl-off-i-95-overpass-in-philadelphia-charged/3320618/). Authorities took the man into custody and later identified him as Raheem Murphy, 35. He was charged with aggravated assault, kidnapping and endangering the welfare of children. According to the Philadelphia District Attorney’s office, Murphy was also charged with endangering King and a Pennsylvania State Trooper who responded to the scene. Prosecutors stated that Murphy drew a gun on his former partner during an argument and kidnapped her along with their child. He then stopped at the overpass at the Cottman Avenue exit, before waving a gun at her and threatening to throw the baby off the overpass. Murphy is being held on a $1.5 million bail and is under a restraining order from the mother and child. He will also be required to take a mental health evaluation. King was asked if she had been scared of ever doing something like that again, and she said she wouldn't hesitate one bit if it happened all over again. “I’d do it again,” she said. “I didn’t see no gun, but when she took the gun from him, that’s when I seen the gun." If you know of any children who are being subjected to abuse, please contact [The Childhelp National Child Abuse](https://www.childhelp.org/) Hotline at (800) 422-4453 If you are being subjected to domestic abuse or know of anyone else who is, please visit [The National Domestic Violence Hotline](https://www.thehotline.org/) website, call 1-800-799-7233, or text LOVEIS to 22522.

author: , PhillyBurbs
title: Bucks County weather forecast heavy rain, wind, possible flooding
text: Weekend washout in Bucks County? Weather forecast calls for heavy rain, winds Earlier this week, [the National Weather Service estimated that 1 to 3 inches of rain will fall across Bucks County on Saturday](https://www.phillyburbs.com/story/news/2024/03/21/bucks-county-weather-forecast-national-weather-service-mount-holly-easter-egg-hunts/73041776007/). The weather service has since revised and upgraded that earlier forecast, and it's safe to say that you're going to need a bigger umbrella. "It's going to be quite a wet day on Saturday. We are expecting 2-4 inches widespread throughout Bucks County, and locally, some places may get more than 4 inches," said Mike Lee, a meteorologist with the National Weather Service. "And it will be quite windy as well. We will see gusting winds of 35 to 45 mph Saturday night heading into Sunday." National Weather Service warns of possible flooding in Bucks County Lee said the expected rain and could have a significant effect on Bucks County. "With all the rain that's going to occur, we are definitely concerned with flooding on streets, in poor drainage areas and in low-lying areas," Lee said. "We are also watching for all that rainfall running off into rivers, banks and streams, and that may lead to localized roads being closed. You could see side roads, main roads and roads that are flood-prone being flooded by this storm." Likewise, Lee said the wind will be a concern, particularly as the storm moves out Saturday evening. "The strongest wind gust will be around 35 to 45 mph as the storm exits. The strongest winds occur Saturday night into Sunday," Lee said. "As a result, isolated power outages can happen due to downed power lines. And with that amount or rain saturating the soil, it makes trees that much looser, so we could see some downed trees." Lee said the storm should move out by 8 p.m. Saturday. The weather service also issued a [flood watch that will be in effect through at least Sunday evening](https://forecast.weather.gov/showsigwx.php?warnzone=PAZ106&warncounty=PAC017&firewxzone=PAZ106&local_place1=Doylestown%20Airport%20PA&product1=Flood+Watch&lat=40.3369&lon=-75.1068). As of Friday morning, the [water level of the Delaware River at Trenton](https://water.weather.gov/ahps2/hydrograph.php?gage=tren4&wfo=phi) stood at 10.48 feet, and is expected to reach 13 feet Sunday morning. Flood stage is 20 feet. Also as of Friday morning, the [water level for the Nehsaminy Creek at Langhorne](https://water.weather.gov/ahps2/hydrograph.php?gage=lngp1&wfo=phi) stood at 1.5 feet, and is expected to surge to 7.7 feet on Saturday before receding. Flood stage is 9 feet. The weather service pushed an alert on X, the social media platform formerly known as Twitter, to alert resident of the enhanced forecast. Saturday's storm leads to a sunny, yet brisk, Sunday Even with the rain, Saturday's high should hover around 54 degrees, according to [the weather service's forecast for Bucks County](https://forecast.weather.gov/MapClick.php?lat=40.33693917700003&lon=-75.10679354299998). Sunday will be mostly sunny, but breezy, with highs around 51 degrees with sustained winds around 25 mph. Mostly sunny conditions are expected on Monday and Tuesday, with highs nearing 51 degrees on both days. There's a slight chance of rain late next week. Styler Orchard planning spring upgrade: [Styer Orchards readies for spring with huge additions to fields. Here's the plan](https://www.phillyburbs.com/story/news/local/2024/03/08/styer-orchards-planning-big-spring-additions-bucks-county-farms-middletown/72868982007/) Weekend Easter egg hunts cancelled, postponed by rain Several Easter egg hunts scheduled for this weekend have been postponed or canceled altogether: - CANCELLED: Annual Easter Egg Hunt: 9:30 a.m. Saturday, March 23, at North Branch Park, 207 Park Ave., Chalfont. "Unfortunately, the Easter Egg Hunt scheduled for Sat., March 23 is cancelled due to inclement weather," [read a portion of the update on New Britain's website](https://newbritaintownship.org/annual-easter-egg-hunt-and-food-drive-march-23/). "Now for the good news. The Easter Bunny will still be hopping on over for indoor photos at the New Britain Township General Meeting Room at 207 Park Ave., Chalfont on Sat., March 23, from 9:30 a.m. to 11:00 a.m. Don’t be late. The bunny hops off to his next destination at 11:00 sharp. This is a First Come – First Serve event." - Wycombe Community Easter Egg Hunt - [RAIN DATE IN EFFECT: Moved from 10 a.m. Sat., March 23, to Sat., March 30](https://quakertown.macaronikid.com/events/65fb92769d4fd42be912f9a7/wycombe-community-easter-egg-hunt), at the First Baptist Church of Wycombe, 4174 Township Line Road in Furlong. Organizers say this free event will also include food, crafts and face-painting. Guide to spring events in Bucks County: [Check out these 50 Easter and other spring events in Bucks County](https://www.phillyburbs.com/story/entertainment/2024/03/04/easter-st-patricks-day-events-bucks-county-pa-peddlers-village-egg-hunts-irish-parades/72788868007/) - Langhorne Borough Easter Egg Hunt - [RAIN DATE IN EFFECT: Moved from 10:30 a.m. Saturday, March 23, to Sat., March 30](https://langhorneborough.com/events/langhorne-borough-easter-egg-hunt/), at Mayor Park, Maple Ave. and Route 413 in Langhorne. This Easter egg hunt is for children between the ages of 2 and 11. - Easter Egg Hunt at Styer Orchard - [RAIN DATE IN EFFECT: Moved from 11 a.m. Sat., March 23, to 4 p.m. Tues., March 26](https://www.facebook.com/events/1100709881127057), at Styer Orchard, 97 Styer Lane in Langhorne. [CANCELLED: Fireside Easter Egg Hunt](https://www.facebook.com/events/475191626490145): 11:30 a.m. Saturday, March 23, at the Fireside Inn, 237 Elmwood Ave. in Feasterville.

author: LMNeuquen
title: Massa presentó su libro y anticipó anécdotas de empresarios que pregonan la libertad y piden al Estado
text:
El exministro de Economía de la Nación y excandidato presidencial, Sergio Massa , reapareció públicamente este jueves para presentar su libro . La editorial Planeta subió un video del tigrense firmando el contrato y contando de que se tratará la publicación.
El anuncio se hizo en la cuenta de Instagram de la editorial. En el video, se lo ve a Massa con camisa blanca, con dos botones desabrochados y cadenita en el cuello, y con una birome genérica en la mano firma los papeles del contrato.
"Estoy muy contento de poder contarte en este libro, al que me invitó Planeta, todos los detalles de mi llegada sorpresiva al ministerio de Economía ", comienza el lider del Frente Renovador.
Luego, enumera los temas que tratará: "el armado del equipo, la pelea con el fondo, la discusión por los Yuanes, el acuerdo con Qatar", y agrega que "sobre todas las cosas, el día a día".
Sergio Massa vende libro "Todos los detalles del equilibrio y las discusiones en la coalición de gobierno", detalla Massa y agrega una crítica a "los empresarios que pregonan la libertad, pero piden prebendas al Estado".
Tras su derrota electoral en el balotaje con Javier Milei, aseguró que se iba a tomar una pausa en su vida política. Luego de eso tuvo muy pocas apariciones públicas, una de ellas en las elecciones del club Tigre, en que ganó su candidato Martín Suárez.
También mantuvo una reunión dirigentes para analizar las primeras medidas del actual presidente; y recientemente fue criticado por Juan Grabois, por ausentarse en la movilización de este miércoles.
La reciente crítica de Juan Grabois a Sergio Massa y otros dirigentes El dirigente del frente Patria Grande y ex precandidato presidencial , Juan Grabois , reclamó a la dirigencia de Unión por la Patria (UxP) que "ponga el cuerpo junto al pueblo trabajador" para "defender la democracia" , al participar de la marcha a Tribunales convocada por la CGT y otras organizaciones en la ciudad de Buenos Aires contra el decreto de necesidad y urgencia (DNU) dictado por el gobierno nacional.
Embed - https://publish.twitter.com/oembed?url=https://twitter.com/Red__Accion/status/1740102686111068582&partner=&hide_thread=false "¿Dónde están los partidos de Unión por la Patria? ¿Dónde están nuestros dirigentes?”, Juan Grabois ( @JuanGrabois ) pic.twitter.com/b7q0Q8Z1vX
— ANRed #25Años (@Red__Accion) December 27, 2023 "Quiero ver a toda la dirigencia de Unión por la Patria poniendo el cuerpo junto al pueblo trabajador porque después el cuerpo, la sangre y el dolor lo ponen los trabajadores y los pobres y el mate se lo toma la casta", expresó Grabois en declaraciones a la prensa durante la concentración en Plaza Lavalle frente a los Tribunales.
"¿Dónde están los partidos de Unión por la Patria? ¿Dónde están nuestros dirigentes? ¿Dónde está el presidente del PJ, ex presidente de la Nación? ¿Dónde está nuestro candidato, que yo voté, Sergio Massa? ¿Dónde están senadores y diputados de Unión por la Patria que tienen que venir a poner la cara?".
